channel.title: Making Morrigans Axe/Javelin train range. Rep ++
channel.description:
Hey guys, ive got all the models and stuff for morrigans throwing axe and javelin, and it works fine. Except that it trains melee and uses melee equiptment bonuses. I was wondering if you guys would know how to make it train range and use range equiptment bonuses. Incase you were wondering, im using black-pearl's source which is a delta server.
Thanks.

item.title: Making Morrigans Axe/Javelin train range. Rep ++
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

u cant even rep nub
and if u have rune crossbow working then use the same methods that does but just change the ids etc…

Read full topic
